name: PDF2JPG
short_description:
This project extends the great work done by Matthew Ephraim (GhostScriptSharp) to create a web-service which will create a JPG page from a PDF.

The web service has been created with Microsoft .Net v4.0 and can be installed on IIS using the files in the "compiled" folder.  

To convert a file, the UNC (or local) path to the file is sent to the web service, and the filename and path for the output file to be deposited.  The input can be verified against the input.xsd file.
summary: Convert PDF to JPG via a web service
